This week’s #Bluegrass120 is our final one. We have highlighted each of the Commonwealth’s 120 counties & all the amazing sites, programs, & people that make our state such a special place. @LeaderMcConnell is proud to work every day on behalf of the people of #Kentucky. #KYinDC

.@LeaderMcConnell is dedicated to improving Kentucky’s infrastructure. Last year, he visited Fayette County’s @BGAirport to highlight a $14.5 million federal grant he helped secure to create a new chapter of quality and service in Lexington. #Bluegrass120 https://t.co/Jh0qp0tltD https://t.co/v0pGuD7fxV

With substance abuse on the rise in Kentucky, @LeaderMcConnell is working hard to direct federal resources toward addiction treatment facilities. In October, he helped provide a treatment clinic in Fayette County with over $2.5 million. #Bluegrass120

https://t.co/hk0KKX1huJ

Last year, @LeaderMcConnell traveled to @universityofky to present a $23.5 million federal award to the @UK_CCTS program. CCTS focuses on disease treatment research in Appalachia, delivering crucial support to serve all of Kentucky. #Bluegrass120

https://t.co/0jRMzmK5Oi https://t.co/j4YyZnfZmd

In 2019, @LeaderMcConnell secured nearly $66 million to develop a new research lab at @UKAgriculture. This lab confirms Central Kentucky’s role as a leader in the agri-business sector and serves both the horse and cattle industries. #Bluegrass120

https://t.co/22mkPGNXmL

In 2019, @LeaderMcConnell helped secure the largest federal grant in @universityofky’s history - $87 million for a Healing Communities study to help law enforcement and mental health professionals address the opioid epidemic. #Bluegrass120
https://t.co/8IiTWTiWil https://t.co/3HVKsVSHb9

Fayette County is home to @universityofky, Kentucky’s largest university. @LeaderMcConnell is a strong supporter of the school and has helped deliver more than $340 million in federal aid to support its research, development, and programming. #Bluegrass120 https://t.co/EZnruiTd0S

To protect Fayette Co.’s horseracing tradition, @LeaderMcConnell worked w/@RepAndyBarr to pass the Horseracing Integrity and Safety Act, creating national standards for Thoroughbred racing to preserve our signature industry & 24,000 workers #Bluegrass120

https://t.co/wAsIO0VYgd

"In #Louisville, Jefferson County Sheriff’s Deputy Brandon Shirley was shot and killed last summer... It is not just regular citizens going about their normal days who need this violent crime epidemic to stop. Our brave men and women in blue also need very badly for it to stop."

"Many jurisdictions have entertained financial attacks on police departments to match these rhetorical attacks. Literally just yesterday, a prominent House Democrat insisted to the press that the far left will not be dropping or diluting their message of '#DefundThePolice.'"

"My hometown of #Louisville set a new all-time murder record last year. 188 homicides. 24 of the victims were children. At one point last year, a staggering 65% of our homicides were going unsolved. And Louisville is now averaging one carjacking every 42 hours."
